text: Steven Sharp Nelson is an American cellist. He is part of The Piano Guys, a YouTube music video channel."Steven Sharp Nelson's Biography" sacredcello.com. Retrieved 10 January 2013. The video 'Moonlight-Electric cello' in which he is featured has had more than 7 million views on YouTube to date. == References == ==Other websites== * Official site Category:Living people Category:American cellists Category:American Latter Day Saints Category:Musicians from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:1977 births Category:21st-century musicians
title: Steven Sharp Nelson
